handoff.objective: Author complete task contracts for credentialed external-platform control enforcement and evidence capture across GitHub, Vercel, and Supabase.

directive.title: dm-deploy-recovery-02-external-controls
directive.summary: Apply and verify external deployment controls in GitHub, Vercel, and Supabase with non-secret auditable evidence aligned to deployment policy.
goals: Enforce and verify GitHub branch protections, default branch policy, and production environment approval controls.
Verify Supabase and Vercel environment separation between test/preview/development and production.
Capture complete non-secret evidence for external control state in repository operations docs.

authoring_requirements.completion_gate: All task contracts complete and validated; executor handoff created.
